original: Blidberg, Metcalfe & Co. A-B i Gbg sed. 27, deläg. 34-45, verkst. dir. i Rederi A-B Kusten sed. 30, dito i Blidbergs Linjeagenturer A-B i Gbg sed. 46. Styr:suppl. i Gbgs hamnarb :kont. SvRK förtj :t., skyttem. i guld.
translated: Blidberg, Metcalfe & Co. A-B in Gothenburg since 1927, part-owner from 1934 to 1945, managing director in Rederi A-B Kusten since 1930, and in Blidberg's Line Agencies A-B in Gothenburg since 1946. Board member: substitute in Gothenburg's harbor board. Awarded Swedish Royal Patriotic Society's (SvRK) medal of merit. Awarded Golden Shooting Medal. Note: "\d\d m. partner's name" means the person got married in the year 19xx.

award.name: Swedish Royal Patriotic Society's Medal of Merit
